title: Bakugan Battle Arena with Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid, Customizable, Spinning Action Figure and Playset, Kids Toys for Boys and Girls 6 and up
descriptions:
**Unleash the Ultimate Bakugan Battle Experience**

Get ready for epic battles with the Bakugan Battle Arena, featuring the Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid. This action-packed playset is perfect for kids aged 6 and up, combining strategy, skill, and fun.

**Customize Your Arena**

The Deluxe Arena is fully customizable, allowing you to create your unique battle environment. With a built-in phone holder, you can capture every thrilling moment and share it with friends. The Sparring Totem and Clan Flags add an extra layer of excitement to your battles.

**Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid**

The Special Attack Dragonoid is a unique, spinning action figure that's ready to take on any opponent. With its included Rip Cord, you can unleash powerful attacks and transform your Bakugan into an unstoppable force.

**Collect, Customize, and Upgrade**

The Bakugan Battle Arena is part of a larger universe, where you can collect and customize your Bakugans, and upgrade your playset with Training Sets (sold separately). The multi-part Ball Linking System allows you to create new combinations and strategies.

**What's Included:**

* Deluxe Arena
* Exclusive Special Attack Bakugan
* 2 Clan Flags
* 3 Sparring Totem
* Character Card
* Special Attack Card
* 2 Gate Card
* XL Rip Cord
* Bakugan Token

**Official Bakugan Product**

This playset is an official Bakugan product, backed by the Spin Master Care Commitment. It also includes a special code for the Roblox online game, allowing you to take your battles to the next level.

**Join the Bakugan Battle**

Don't miss out on the ultimate Bakugan experience. Get your Bakugan Battle Arena today and unleash the power of the Exclusive Special Attack Dragonoid.
